disclaimer.title: * Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The Investor understands and agrees that the allocation of shares of the names Portfolio or Class in the Fund is on a non-guaranteed, best-efforts basis, upon acceptance of the Investor’s Commitment Offer Form by the Company. The Company, the Investment Manager and their respective affiliates are not liable if the Investor receives either a lower allocation of Shares in the named Portfolio or Class or none at all. The Investor also acknowledges that the actual value of Holding Cost levied depends on the state on which the Shares in the corresponding Portfolio or Class are registered as having been allocated to the Investor.
